condition.description: The entity condition type to check for on the acting entity.
condition.markdownDescription: The entity condition type to check for on the acting entity.

type.description:
## Actor Condition

---



[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/actor_condition)

Checks for an [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/actor_condition) on the actor entity.

Type ID: `origins:actor_condition`




---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
    "type": "origins:actor_condition",
    "condition": {
       "type": "origins:tamed"
    }
}
```

This example will check if the actor entity is a tamable and tamed mob.
